reviews.body: Whether it is Robert's attention to detail, his clear communication, his insatiable work-ethic or his infectious personality - there are many reasons why when something needs to be done he is the first person I turn to for results.

Robert is without a doubt one of the best people I have had the pleasure of working with. The amount of intelligence and diligence he has displayed has been incredible to behold. He will always deliver the highest quality work and do so with a great attitude.

Robert's attention to detail, positive attitude, caring nature and solution-oriented mindset made him the ultimate developer. He was such a pleasure to work with and far exceeded my expectations. I would recommend him for any web development project, no matter how complicated or demanding.
